title: üõ† Microsoft Office for Mac ‚Äì Quick Setup & Fixes
content: Last updated: April 2025 Hey there! If Microsoft Office is giving you trouble, start here. Whether you're setting it up for the first time or running into issues, we've got your back. *BEFORE TRYING ANY STEP, SAVE YOUR PROGRESS * ‚úÖ First Things First: How to Install Office the Right Way Let‚Äôs make sure you‚Äôre on the latest version. Open Okta Click the Office 365 tile In the top-right, click Install and more Choose Install Microsoft 365 Apps From there just Install Office! Let the #Digital-workplace team know so we make sure you have the right access to your account Now you‚Äôre ready to install and sign in with your Simplifi email! üëâ Use your full email + password (FastPass won‚Äôt work here) üöë Common Fixes (Fast + Friendly) üß± Stuck on ‚ÄúBrowser Not Supported‚Äù? No worries! This means you do not have a license to that supports the Microsoft Office! Your Using an Older Microsoft License Account That Has Had Its Last Days! Here‚Äôs a quick refresh: Delete Microsoft AutoUpdate and your Office apps Reinstall fresh from Microsoft Office Using How to Install Office the Right Way This just means your license needs a little nudge. Open Excel Click The Excel Tab in the top left corner of your Navigation, Next to the apple logo About Excel More Info Refresh License This has been a on going issue, so every case is different! Reach out to #digital-workplace if this doesn‚Äôt fix your issue üßæ File Locked or Not Opening? ‚ùå Can‚Äôt Save? Let‚Äôs fix that: Quit Excel completely (Force Quit if needed) Wait until it fully closes Try opening the file again Still no luck? Move the file to your Desktop and try again üí¨ Still need a hand? Send us a message on the #digital-workplace slack channel & tell us where you're stuck!
